vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Zebulun living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.14;
son of: Zebulun (H2074);
brother of: Sered (H5624) and Elon (H0356H)
Group of yach.le.el (יַחְלְאֵל "Jahleel" H3177)
§ Jahleelites = "the hope of God"
descendants of Jahleel of the tribe of Zebulun
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jahleel, hijo de Zabulón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅利族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝的希望"
西布倫支派雅利的後裔(民 26:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅利族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝的希望"
西布伦支派雅利的后裔(民 26:26)
